entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
